# Idea templates

Reusable templates for turning Islamic tech ideas into clear, actionable, and production-ready plans. Use these when dissecting an idea, checking Islamic authenticity, planning go-to-market, doing competitive analysis, or creating personas and messaging.

| Template | Purpose |
|----------|--------|
| [Idea dissection](idea-dissection.md) | Break down an idea into problem, solution, users, and scope |
| [Islamic authenticity](islamic-authenticity.md) | Checklist and process for Sharia alignment and scholarly input |
| [Go to market](go-to-market.md) | Launch strategy, channels, and first 90 days |
| [Competitive analysis](competitive-analysis.md) | Competitors, differentiation, and positioning |
| [Market opportunity & research](market-opportunity-research.md) | TAM/SAM/SOM, trends, and validation |
| [Brand generation](brand-generation.md) | Name, voice, and visual identity |
| [Name / idea generation](name-idea-generation.md) | Naming and tagline ideas for products |
| [Target personas](target-personas.md) | Define who you’re building for |
| [Messaging for personas](messaging-for-personas.md) | Copy and value props per persona |
| [Social media marketing](social-media-marketing.md) | Streamlined social and content plan |
| [Launch checklist](launch-checklist.md) | Pre-launch checklist for Islamic tech products |

See [../workflows/README.md](../workflows/README.md) for how these fit into the **idea → production** workflow.
